title: [Large-Scale] Intensive Learning Course Based on Language MOOC Discussion Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Terminology and Experience with Online Learning
context.additional_context: An environment requiring smartphone-based access optimization, emphasizing asynchronous discussion participation

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic science terminology through discussions of five or more real-world case studies.
Learners can access and participate in discussion forums in mobile environments with over 90% reliability.
Learners apply and implement self-directed language learning strategies at least three times based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
